Description:
Cross-platform computer game in the genre Postapokaliptika third-person open world with elements of racing and survival, which will be released on the PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC (Steam) 31 August 2015. Initially, the game was announced for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3, but 2 March 2015, developers officially announced the closing of project development for these two platforms (the reason for the termination of support for the PS3 and Xbox 360 in the summer of 2015). The game is developed by Swedish studio Avalanche and will be published in the holding company Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment. The project is based on the film series "Mad Max" Rokatanski about Max, who is forced to survive in a post-apocalyptic desert world Australia full of chaos and violence. The official announcement of the game took place during a press conference Sony international game E3, June 10, 2013.

Features:
- Feel what it means to be a Mad Max - Mining and better equipment and weapons in order to survive in battles where skills come in handy melee and ranged, as well as the ability to think tactically.
- Be careful, desert insidious, difficult to survive here. Against you, and difficult terrain and harsh climate, and a gang of heavily armed looters. In the vastness of the vast open-world dangers lurk at every turn.
- Suitable all - any discovery in the course and will be used to improve the equipment, weapons and transport. Raid shelter hostile factions, you will be able to extract precious resources.
- Become invincible driving a car, hung with all sorts of weapons. Featuring realistic physics, no battle will not appear similar to the previous one.
- Ober your dream car - think, adjust, enhance their fortress on wheels. Select the body of the soul, to equip it with the engine, weapons and armor. Only skilled will be able to survive.

Features repack:- Game Version - 1.0.1.1
- Do not cut / recoded
- Automatic change of time zone UTC + 08: 00 on the game (particularly tablets, is required for a more stable operation of the game)

Supplement:- The Ripper
- ThirstCutter
- Pentacal GulpCut
- Rockmaw Brawla
- Stampeedy Knokshok
